summary: A couple of theatrical producers try to get backing for their musical show.
cast: Tim Moore|Elwood Smith|Duke Williams|Alan Jackson|Sheila Guyse|Betti Mays|Sybil Lewis|Warren Patterson|Slam Stewart|Deek Watson|Sidney Catlett|Ann Cornell|Gene Krupa|Sid Catlett Band|International Jitterbugs|Basil Spears|Slam Stewart Trio|Eddie Davis|Milton Wood
title: Boy! What a Girl!
